content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that you have the necessary raw materials in your inventory to supply the furnaces. Check the inventory before starting the furnaces to avoid running out of ingredients.

### Errors when crafting solar panels and steam engines
- Verify that you have the required resources to craft solar panels and steam engines. Collect the necessary materials before attempting to craft these items.
